subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ramon Santiago’s run-scoring triple in the bottom of the 10th inning gave Detroit a 2-1 win over the Tampa Bay Rays on Monday night, keeping the Tigers in a virtual tie for first place.
snippet: Ramon Santiago’s run-scoring triple in the bottom of the 10th inning gave Detroit a 2-1 win over the Tampa Bay Rays on Monday night, keeping the Tigers in a virtual tie for first place.
